summary: Check that cached sources remain reachable and that their checksums match the stored metadata.

usage.description: Validate a single source and emit structured results (URL accessibility, checksum match, issues array).
Batch validation for every source—useful for CI health checks.

fields: urlAccessible – boolean derived from HEAD/GET depending on source type
checksumMatches – confirms local cache matches stored sha256
issues – array of human-readable warnings (missing files, mismatched checksums, offline URLs)
agent_workflow: Run after `blz update --all` to confirm nothing drifted during ingestion.
If `checksumMatches` is false, re-index via `blz update <alias>` or re-add the source.
Surface `issues` back to operators or logs so they can repair failing sources.
